text: Dove Cameron and Thomas Doherty are still together despite recent breakup rumors. Dove took to Twitter to squash the rumors that her and her beau have called it quits. In a series of tweets, Dove revealed that the rumors started because of recent social media posts that many fans had believed meant that the couple had broken up. PSA : THOMAS AND I ARE FINE. no we are not broken up yes we are still together no we are not fighting we are madly in love and better than ever please stop speculating / spreading rumors when you have absolutely no basis all smooth sailing over here thanks for checking innnnnn not everything i post has to do with thomas. ESPECIALLY when it ’ s vague / negative. i wouldn ’ t indirect my boyfriend like that?
